strings.Value: "My companion has taken a liking to your charm. Would you sell it for, say, 50 gold coins?"
"Best wares on the river! Don't waste time asking where they're from â€” get these deals while they last!"
{n}You notice Octavia's fingers reach for a sparkling charm on the vendor's belt.{/n}
{n}Octavia pouts, but she moves her hand away from the vendor's property.{/n}
{n}The vendor gladly takes the gold.{/n} "Of course, of course! As you wish. Here, please... Ah, that will suit you nicely!" {n}The vendor smiles as he gives Octavia the trinket.{/n}
{n}Octavia takes the charm from the vendor's hands, fastens it to her belt, and smiles at you.{/n} "Thank you! It's just lovely. And so are you!"
{n}While you pretend to check the prices of various goods, the charm quietly moves from the vendor's belt to Octavia's pocket. Octavia blows you a kiss.{/n}
{n}Octavia hides the charm in her pocket with a playful smile and turns away as though nothing had happened.{/n}
